Gitea LXC

Gitea is a self-hosted software development service that supports Git repositories, code review, CI/CD, project management and more. It offers flexible deployment options, compatibility with GitHub Actions, and integrations with various tools and databases.

To create a new Proxmox VE Gitea LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Gitea, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/gitea.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 1vCPU - SQLite3 ⚡

Gitea Interface: IP:3000
